question:
The programme AKRUTI-KRUTIK-FORCE:
  1. is an initiative from Bhabha Atomic Research Centre.
  2. aims to provide easy access of modern technologies to rural areas.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: The scheme aims to create structured and scalable network of technology nodes in rural areas providing easy access to modern technologies to all villagers in their own villages.‘AKRUTI’ is an acronym for ‘Advance Knowledge and RUral Technology Implementation’ programme. It is an initiative from BARC.
